info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:56PM MDT until June 03 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 356 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elkins, or 35 miles northeast of Roswell, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
